definitions.definition: the condition in which things are happening or being done.
examples: there has been a sustained level of activity in the economy

definitions.definition: busy or vigorous action or movement.
examples: the room was a hive of activity
synonyms: comings and goings "there was a lot of activity in the area"

definitions.definition: a thing that a person or group does or has done.
actions taken by a group in order to achieve their aims.
examples: the police were investigating anarchist activities

definitions.definition: the degree to which something displays its characteristic property or behavior.
a thermodynamic quantity representing the effective concentration of a particular component in a solution or other system, equal to its concentration multiplied by an activity coefficient.
